category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ProductBOPAllowedTemplates
preference.preference_description: Defines the cloning rules available when using a product BOP as a template for the creation of another product BOP. The rules in this preference are displayed in the Cloning Rule menu of the Configuration pane of the Enter Template Information step in the New Product BOP wizard. Valid Values: Accepts a list of names of cloning rules.
